description: West Kelowna's new trail.  Built in mid 2015, this trail is a fun hike and is relatively easy for anyone in decent shape.  This out and back trail Climbs up the West face of Boucherie mountain to the very top.  Great views throughout the hike.  Mostly hardpacked smooth trail surface.  Will be hot in the summer as it is mostly exposed.  The trail is well marked, and should be easy to find/followYou'll climb from an elevation of about 470 meters up to about 745 meters.
directions: Turn south on Byland Road, travel approx. 1km to the Parking lot and Trail head.
title: Boucherie Rush Trail
